document.text:
From: 
To: 
Subject: RE: Additional inmates 
Date: Mon, 16 Dec 2019 17:32:16 +0000 
Sounds good. and I have a call tomorrow at 4:30 with =and or the Epstein probate matter, but I'll 
send around an email rescheduling. 
From: 
Sent: Monday, December 16, 2019 12:27 PM 
To: 
Subject: Re: Additional inmates 
Totally agreed, let's try to start interviews on the island at 10:30 (in the hopes they'll start pulling them earlier) if that 
works for the agents. I can clear my calendar that day, I'm sure the chiefs will understand. We could try meeting late 
tomorrow afternoon with them if they prefer, maybe around 4:30. 
Sent from my iPhone 
On Dec 16, 2019, at 9:15 AM, 
> 
wrote: 
Ok, great! So, Rikers on Weds? Think 12 is too late to start if we are trying to do three people? If so, I will find someone 
to cover my court appearance in the morning. 
Sent from my iPhone 
On Dec 16, 2019, at 12:06 PM, 
Hey— just sorted out scheduling. I'm coming back today, so we can keep 
Sent from my iPhone 
On Dec 16, 2019, at 7:54 AM, 
wrote: 
on the calendar for tomorrow. 
> 
wrote: 
Got it, good luck. We could also try moving to Thursday afternoon - I doubt either of those people will take all 
day —  and that way we could make Wednesday or Rikers day. 
Sent from my iPhone 
On Dec 16, 2019, at 10:50 AM, wrote: 
We may need to move the interview to Weds (I just found out I may have to stay in LA an extra day, returning 
on the red eye Weds). Will know more in 2 or so hours. 
Sent from my iPhone 
On Dec 16, 2019, at 7:48 AM, 
> 
wrote: 
Could you do Weds? We could move our afternoon team meeting, obviously. 
From: 
Sent: Monday, December 16, 2019 10:45 AM 
EFTA00021003

To: 
Cc: 
Subject: Re: Additional inmates 
Has everyone been served at this point? 
Sent from my iPhone 
On Dec 16, 2019, at 7:39 AM, 
Just checked; that's right, 12/20 is the al date for 
From: 
Sent: Monday, December 16, 2019 10:37 AM 
To: 
Cc: 
Subject: Re: Additional inmates 
Some als have a  date of 12/20. I'm not at my desk, but I think nor sure. 
wrote: 
On Dec 16, 2019 10:26 AM, wrote: 
Thanks, sounds good. I'm free on Friday if that works for everyone. 
Sent from my iPhone 
On Dec 16, 2019, at 7:23 AM, 
Good morning, 
=is going to try and speak with the 3 additional inmates DOC ID identified this afternoon. He would like to 
be able to tell them a date we would interview them if they wanted to speak. When are you guys available? 
Thank you, 
Investigator 
Department of Investigation 
80 Maiden Lane 
New York, NY 10038 
Phone: 
wrote:

hereby notified that you have received this communication in error and that any review, disclosure, 
dissemination, distribution or copying of it or its contents is prohibited. If you have received this 
communication in error, please notify me immediately by replying to this message and delete this 
communication from your computer. Thank you. 
EFTA00021004
